summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to land use and zoning; amending Seattle Municipal Code Sections 23.34.079 and 23.47.012; and amending Chapter 23.32 of the Seattle Municipal Code at Plats 36E, page 103, and 40E, page 111, of the Official Land Use Map to rezone areas within the Capitol Hill Urban Center Village from Lowrise 3 (L3), Lowrise 3/Residential Commercial (L3/RC), Midrise (MR), Midrise/Residential Commercial (MR/RC), and Neighborhood Commercial 3 with a 40' height limit (NC 3 40') to Neighborhood Commercial 3/Residential with a 40' height limit (NC 3/R 40').
